features: Sleek, Thin, and Metal, easy-to-use, highly flexible protection for your files.
This portable hard drive by default is formatted as exFAT, which works well with Windows and Mac. Some of the old devices may need reformat.
Automatically recognized by Windows operating system, so there is no software to install or configure needed.
No reformat required for Windows and Mac, just plug it in and play.
You will get-1x Portable Hard Drive,1 x USB3.0 Cable, 1 x User Manual, 3 Years Manufacturer Warranty.
body.description: About capacity difference About Capacity: Hard disk vendors are using decimal arithmetic: 1MB = 1000KB, 1G = 1000MB calculated But the operating system is using binary arithmetic: 1MB = 1024KB, 1GB = 1024MB. So there are some differences between display capacity and nominal capacity of hard disk products. However, this is allowed to exist. Please do not doubt his authenticity. 160GB ≈ 149GB 250GB ≈ 232GB 320GB ≈ 298GB 500GB ≈ 465GB Store files This product can back up your movies, games, TV shows, and videos. You can connect to the computer to back up your files anytime, anywhere. You don’t need to worry, the computer memory is full, you only need to buy our external hard drive, you can solve your troubles Suitable for the crowd Whether you are a student, office worker, or housewife, you need an external hard drive to back up files for you When you are traveling, you have taken a lot of good-looking photos. Don’t worry about running out of memory on your phone and camera. The external hard drive can back up a lot of photos for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NRICO Portable External Hard Drive USB 3.0 HDD 2.5inch Storage Compatible for PC Support system: 98SE, ME, 2000,Vista, WIN7,WIN8,win10，MAC Hard Drive Type: 2.5" HDD USB Interface: USB 3.0 Disk Rotational Speed: 5400rpm Package includes: USB 3.0 External Hard Drives*1 ，USB 3.0 cable*1

Introducing NRICO Ultra Slim Portable Hard Drive Sleek, Thin, and Metal, easy-to-use, highly flexible protection for your files Adopts imported extraordinary space steel material Delivers handy portable storage Easy to take wherever you go To maximize performance, please connect your hard drive to a USB 3.0 port, also compatible with USB 2.0. Two colors for your choice This device has been formatted as EXFAT and does not need to install software, plug and play, so it is easy to store files. No reformat required for Windows and Mac, just plug it in and play. No need to install, just open the box for use. Simply connect the attached power supply and USB cable USB3.0 high-speed transmission USB 3.0-powered portable add-on storage, compatible Plug and play, easy to use with no software to install Provides ample storage space for your music, movies and other files Internal shock sensor and ramp loading technology protects your drive and data

About capacity difference About Capacity: Hard disk vendors are using decimal arithmetic: 1MB = 1000KB, 1G = 1000MB calculated But the operating system is using binary arithmetic: 1MB = 1024KB, 1GB = 1024MB. So there are some differences between display capacity and nominal capacity of hard disk products. However, this is allowed to exist. Please do not doubt his authenticity. 160GB ≈ 149GB 250GB ≈ 232GB 320GB ≈ 298GB 500GB ≈ 465GB Store files This product can back up your movies, games, TV shows, and videos. Don’t worry about running out of memory on your phone and camera. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fast, affordable auxiliary drive. Nice gray color and seems well buikt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised, great drive so far.
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived quickly and connected, formatted easily for use. Working perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and functional. Cheap build.
reviews.reviewText: Decent. Cheap feeling, but it's relatively fast and it has the actual capacity. It's very affordable, can't go wrong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Would buy again for my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great value for money. I formatted it twice before usage just out of precaution. The drive works very well and is very compact. Uses a older style USB data cable though haven't seen thoes in ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I needed it for. No regerts.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive external drive to hold Warzone and a couple of other games that I will play on my new Xbox. It works on both Xbox one and series S. It was easy to setup and transfers are faster than downloads. It had the advertised amount of memory for a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great When It Works!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item because I teach & it seemed to be a good idea to organize my lessons & resources that I download. It worked well for 3 months and then the issues began. My computers cannot detect the device. I can’t access my documents & since this cord isn’t a standard USB I can’t find a replacement cord.Update: I purchased a replacement cord & the device is still faulty. Do not purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This thing is pretty awesome. The only thing is if you only know English and not Chinese then you can’t read the drive name if you rename it. I am sure you can easily change the settings. I just reformatted it with Linux disk utilities and then it changed to English when you name the drive. But if your in a crutch and need a drive to add someone’s files to because your restoring their computer, it works perfect. Very well packed to.
Fácil de usar, superó mis expectativas!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonito diseño, diferente a otras marcas
reviews.reviewText: Diseño elegante diferente a otras marcas , lo detecto mi computadora a la primera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto y a un muy buen precio
reviews.reviewText: Me pareció excelente para respaldar mis archivos de la computadora
Lo compré y en dos compradoras no es compatible, deberían indicar en las características que esto sucede con determinadas marcas de computadora porque en HP y Dell no lo reconocen. Mala experiencia
